eu.cqse.check.framework.core

Annotation Type Check


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
 @IndexAnnotated
public @interface Check
    Annotation that marks a class as custom check and provides some meta-data for it.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String description
      Returns the description.
      java.lang.String groupName
      Returns the analysis-group name.
      ELanguage[] languages
      Returns all supported languages.
      java.lang.String name
      Returns the name.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String categoryName
      Returns the analysis name of the analysis category.
      EFindingEnablement defaultEnablement
      Returns the default enablement.
      ECheckParameter[] parameters
      Returns all parameters that must be provided to the check.
      java.lang.Class<? extends IGlobalExtractionPhase<?,?>>[] phases
      The pre-run extraction phases that are needed for this check to run.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        Returns the name.

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        Returns the description.

      • groupName

        public abstract java.lang.String groupName
        Returns the analysis-group name.

      • languages

        public abstract ELanguage[] languages
        Returns all supported languages.

      • categoryName

        public abstract java.lang.String categoryName
        Returns the analysis name of the analysis category.
        Default:
        "Code Anomalies"

      • defaultEnablement

        public abstract EFindingEnablement defaultEnablement
        Returns the default enablement.
        Default:
        eu.cqse.check.framework.core.EFindingEnablement.YELLOW

      • parameters

        public abstract ECheckParameter[] parameters
        Returns all parameters that must be provided to the check.
        Default:
        {}

      • phases

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends IGlobalExtractionPhase<?,?>>[] phases
        The pre-run extraction phases that are needed for this check to run.
        Default:
        {}
